item.title: ChatGPT vs. salade niçoise
item.description: Plan a 7 day trip to Cote d’Azur for a couple with an 8-month old toddler. They are flying to Nice mid-January and will have a rental car. First couple of days in and around Nice, the rest of the stay within 300 kilometers of Nice. Paul na lotnisku Chopina: Nieduże pudełko, sporo czarnych oliwek, sos chyba vinegrette, bez anchovies. Zawieźliśmy do Nicei. Sałatkę nicejską. Day 1 Arrive in Nice and check into a hotel.
